edu.monash.fit2099.simulator.time

Class Scheduler.Event

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.monash.fit2099.simulator.time.Scheduler.Event
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Comparable<Scheduler.Event>
    Enclosing class:
    Scheduler

    private class Scheduler.Event
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Comparable<Scheduler.Event>
    An Event is the execution of a Action, by an Actor, at a point in time. The Actor may be null in the case of simulations that allow the world to change automatically.
    Author:
    ram

    • Constructor Detail

      • Event

        public Event(ActionInterface what,
             Actor<?> who,
             int when)
        Constructor for an Event object.
        Parameters:
        what - what Action to be performed as the event
        who - the actor of the event. The Actor may be null in the case of simulations that allow the world to change automatically.
        when - when the event should occur

    • Method Detail

        public int getTime()

      • compareTo

        public int compareTo(Scheduler.Event e)
        Compare this against another Event, e.

        Events will be compared by their time (when) and also by the priority of their Actions (what)

        Specified by:
        compareTo in interface java.lang.Comparable<Scheduler.Event>
        Parameters:
        e - the event to compare this Event to
        Returns:
        • 0 if the events are simultaneous and their Actions have the same priority
        • a positive integer if,
          • the Event this happens before e OR
          • the Event this and e happens at the same time but the Action of Event this has higher priority than the Action of Event e
        • a negative integer if,
          • the Event this happens after the e OR
          • the Event this and e happens at the same time but the Action of event this has lower priority than the Action of Event e
        See Also:
        #what}, #when}
